text: Hello, are you ready to talk about Save the Children?
What is Save the Children? I haven't heard about that organization
Save the Children is an International organization that ensures children's right to health, safety and education.
Oh thats's amazing! Do doctors/nurses/teachers/etc. volunteer in order to provide services to the locations that the organization operates in?
Save the Children is supported by all sorts of volunteers, including people like yourself who make small cash donations.
Do they hold fundraisers like some of the other big name charities that tend to draw in celebritiries and other famous figures?
They conduct relief efforts; they are preparing now to help children in Hawaii? I am not certain of all the ways they raise money though; I know they depend a lot on small donations.
What issue(s) are going on in Hawaii that requires them to go there and provide aid?
Hurricane like conditions; the Big Island just got thirty inches of rain.
Wow, I'm surprised I didn't hear about that! Are they still operating in Puerto Rico? I know they are still rebuilding

Yes, it is Hurricane Lane. I cannot imagine how scary it would be for a child to experience that type of weather. I am not sure about the specifics regarding Hurricane Maria, but Save the Children touches children's lives in a positive way all over the world. 155 million so far.
Thats incredible. Are there setbacks due to politics or government interferences when going into certain countries?

I am sure they encounter many roadblocks; that is why they are so donation dependent. Would you consider making a donation today? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all of your payment.
I'll donate $0.10 from my earnings to Save the Children
Thank you. Every little bit helps. The research team is collecting all donations and forwarding them to Save the Children.
Of course, it is my pleasure to contribute. It seems like a great charity
It does, I bet it feels good to help.
What percentage of the donations is used towards the children, ie. not used for administration costs and salaries?
You can learn more at  URL
Thank you so much for the information!
